issue.title: [CF 1253] Show Keypress
issue.body:
Not sure if possible or already implemented, but can I set up an icon to show keypresses (similar to an actionbar where it shows the key being pressed down or pushed)

I love the flexibility of TMW and how I can add activation borders/sounds to my cds and would like to use TMW as a replacement for cd action bar (I use Dominos action bar addon and a Razer Naga. I would just keep the opacity @ 0% with Dominos so the keybinds still respond.

Here's what I want it to look like w/ my current setup but just show keypresses:
http://i.imgur.com/PtkBGHD.jpg (tmw right of Dominos)

If this is already possible, i'm sorry for the ticket, I could not find anything on it anywhere!


> Posted by CurseForge user Seathasky | Imported from CurseForge issue #1253 | Raw
